name: A Daydream Away
description:
A Daydream Away is a short Kinetic Novel that follows the relationship between the reader and the high-spirited Elaina. What starts as a chance encounter blossoms into much more, until a bittersweet twist is revealed. Are happy endings truly possible, or are they only found in Hollywood and dreams? Find out in A Daydream Away.

Word Count: 2,323

Like the soundtrack and looking for a composer for your next project? Contact me at "markknappjr@gmail.com" to chat!

OST Spotify Link*: (While the OST is available for streaming, it is currently under the wrong artist. This issue will be resolved ASAP!)

Hardware Specs:

Windows

  • Version: Windows Vista or higher.
  • CPU: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • RAM: 2.0 GB
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c
  • Free Hard Drive Space: 2GB

macOS

  • Version: 10.10+
  • CPU: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only)
  • RAM: 2.0 GB
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Free Hard Drive Space: 2GB

Linux

  • Version: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • CPU: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • RAM: 2.0 GB
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Free Hard Drive Space: 2GB

Android

  • Pretty much any current device :)
